name: World Summit and Expo on Vaccines Research
content: It is a great pleasure for us to welcome all Academician, Researchers & Developers, Healthcare professionals, Students and Entrepreneurs to join the World Summit and Expo on Vaccines Research (VACCINES2024), which will be held in Austin, TX, USA during March 11-13, 2024\. The objective of VACCINES2024 is to provide a unique forum for discussion of the latest developments, refresh your knowledge and will offer plenty of networking opportunities, providing you a chance to meet and interact with leading researchers as well as most influential minds in the field of vaccines research. The conference with major scientific themes of Design and Development of Vaccines, Vaccine Delivery, Vaccine Durability, Vaccine Mandates, Computational Vaccines, Social Implications of Vaccines, Immunology Mechanisms, 3rd Generation Covid Vaccines, Influenza, Regulatory affairs, commercial utilization, policy and safety, Veterinary Vaccines and Gene vaccines etc., at all length scales. We believe worldwide academician, researchers & developers, healthcare professionals, students and entrepreneurs in the fields will create huge opportunities by showcasing the growth and breakthrough of vaccines development at a time when so many new innovations and challenges are available. Finally, we hope and trust that you will find the conference and your visit to the very beautiful and exciting city of Austin, TX, in March 2024 both valuable and enjoyable! Yours Sincerely, Prof. Sara Louise Cosby Queenâ€™s University Belfast, UK Conference Chair: VACCINES2024
